name: Red Romeo
description:
This cool looking fretless 3 String sounds as good as it looks! 

It has a single piezo with tone and volume and nice high action for down and dirty slide playing. It sounds great overdriven and equally good clean. It has nail markers on the top edge of the neck at the 3rd, 5th, 7th, 9th, 12th, 15th, 17th, 19th & 24th frets so you aren't completely relying on your ear. 

Features:

Red & White Romeo Y Julieta Cigar Box 
Tassie Oak Neck 
Single Piezo Pickup with Tone and Volume
Bolt nut and Eye Bolt Bridge
Nail Fret Markers
Strings: .049, .036, & .028 - Open G (GDG) 
Includes 1 x glass bottle neck slide 

Serial Number: M121

If you have any questions at all or would like more photos, email me via the contact page. 

Please note: additional $25 shipping anywhere in Australia. 

Happy to ship internationally, however rates vary so please contact me prior to purchasing online.

options.name: International Postage Fees Apply - Please contact me prior to purchasing online

name: Cohiba
description:
This is surely one of the nicest all wood cigar boxes around. Clean, neat and stylish with a tele style 3-way switch to compliment it. 

It has two separate piezo disks connected to a 3 -way switch. The action is a nice compromise between high and low making it great for both finger style and slide. The 3-way switch gives you 3 tones, back pickup, front pickup and a combination of the two. The sound is big and full and it's great to play.

Features:
All Wood Cohiba Cigar Box 
Tassie Oak Neck and Fretboard
2 Separate Piezo Disks
3-way Switch with Tone and Volume
Bone Nut
Bone and Rosewood Bridge
Strings: .049, .036, & .018 - Open G (GDB) 
Includes 1 x Glass Bottle Neck Slide 

Serial Number: M120

If you have any questions at all or would like more photos, email me via the contact page. 

Please note: additional $25 shipping anywhere in Australia. 

Happy to ship internationally, however rates vary so please contact me prior to purchasing online.

description:
This is a 6 String standard tuned electric cigar box guitar. 

It has a single humbucker with tone and volume and it really does look, sound and play great! 

I'm really enjoying playing this one at the moment, but am happy to see it go to a good home!

Arturo Fuente Cigar Box

name: Justus Van Maurik - House of Lords
description:
This is a great old second hand all wood box. I've been keeping this one for myself, but I'm running low on stock so it's now up for sale and back to the shed for me! This box resonates really nicely acoustically, which really shines through when plugged in. It handles overdrive nicely also... check out the Youtube video in the links page. 

It's tuned to an open G - GDB. Great for finger-picking style play with enough of a raised action for slide playing also. 

Features:
All Wood Justus Van Maurik - House of Lords Cigar Box
Recycled hardwood Neck 
Tassie Oak Fretboard
Piezo Rod Pickup under Floating Bolt Bridge
I x metal soundhole
Silver Corners
Bolt nut 
Strings: .049W, .038W & .028W, Open G (GBG)

name: Stubby
description:
This little fella has a shortened neck but still sounds big. Perfect for traveling or for the young budding musician - sure beats listening to 'Mary had a little lamb' on recorder!!! Instead they could be playing Buddy Guy's version on CBG ;-)

Please note: The Telecaster and Blues Junior Amp are not included (Obviously). They are just in the picture to show the size of the Stubby CBG.

name: Cigar Box Guitar Kits
description:
I have put together a basic 3-string Cigar Box Guitar Kit with full instructions on how to put it together. 

The Kit includes: 

1 x Cigar Box (Fuente or similar) 
1 x pre-soldered piezo pickup & jack
3 x quality tuning pegs 
4 x screened brass corners with screws
2 x pre-cut and filed threaded bolts for bridge & nut 
1 x fully detailed instruction manual

I don't supply the timber necks as this is easily obtainable from your local hardware store and by not supplying this it helps keep the postage price down. However I can supply fretted fretboards on request if you are thinking of fretting your CBG (POA).

options.name: International Postage Fees Apply - Please contact me prior to purchasing online

name: Oliva Reserve Shorty
description:
This OLIVA has a short 22" scale neck. It has a sink hole strainer soundhole and brass hinge for a tailpiece. The neck is narrow and is easy to play and the sink hole strainer gives it some nice banjoesque tones. It has been finished with the vintage worn look. It's tuned to an alternate open G - GDB. 

Features:
All Wood Oliva Connecticut Reserve Cigar Box
Recycled Hardwood Neck
Tassie Oak Fretboard
Dual Piezo Disk Pickup 
Bone Nut & Bridge
Sink Hole Strainer Soundhole
Strings: .038 .028 & .018, Open G (GDB)

description:
I love these boxes, but only have one left until I can get my hands on some more. This 4 string CBG has a humbucker and dual piezo disk pickups with a 3-way switch to allow easy switching between the humbucker and piezo and to blend the two pickups. The action on this guitar is set medium for slide and finger playing. 

Features:
Ashton VSG, 22 Year Salute Cigar Box
Tassie Oak Neck 
Rosewood Fretboard
Dual piezo disk pickups 
Single humbucker pickup
Metal guitar adjustable bridge
Bone Nut

It has a Humbucker and a Piezo disk and a 3 way switch to easily switch between pickups and to also blend the 2. The Blend of the Humbucker and Piezo is awesome - better than I was expecting. 

I plan on making a few more of these.

name: Arturo Fuente 4 String
description:
This is a 4 string CBG with rosewood fretboard and bone nut and bridge, with separate Piezo rod pickup and double piezo disk pickups. 

The action is set just right for finger-playing and slide - it plays beautifully. It has bone nut and bridge. 

It's tuned to an open G with the high G and B strings reversed so there is a G string on the 1st and 4th an octave apart. I like this tuning as you can get some real twang by playing chords and runs on the D and B while letting the two G's ring out. However you can change the B and High G back around for a more standard open G tuning... remember there are no rules ;-)

Features:
Fuente Chateau Cuban Belicoso Cigar Box
Recycled Hardwood Neck, AAA Rosewood Fretboard
Piezo Rod Pickup under Floating Hardwood / Nut Bridge
2 Piezo disk pickups
Black Screen Mesh Soundhole
Silver Corners
Bone Nut 
Bone Bridge
Strings:  .038, .028, .014 & .018 - Open G (G, D, B, G) 
Includes 1 x glass bottle neck slide 

Serial Number: M108

If you have any questions at all or would like more photos, email me via the contact page. 

Please note: additional $25 shipping within Australia.

Happy to ship internationally, however rates vary so please contact me prior to purchasing online.

name: Monte' Cristo - Recycled Timber CBG
description:
This is one of my favourites... I really made it for myself and have been reluctant to sell it until now as I play this one regularly in my band. I have another similar one almost finished so as with them all it's time to move it on. 

I mostly play it for the slide tracks as it has a nice raised action, great for slide playing. Both the humbucker and the piezo sound great, perhaps it's the big old hunk of hardwood that gives it the tone it has??? You can hear a recorded track of it played through a Tweed Fender Blues Deluxe (excuse the language in the song ;-))  https://missionbrownmusic.bandcamp.com/track/long-fingernail

The neck on this one is an old solid hardwood roof baton salvaged from a reno - it's probably about 100 years old. Unlike modern roof batons, this is one hell of a piece of hard timber - it took a bit of elbow grease to shape it!!! The box is an old Monte' Cristo Habana. 

It has a single humbucker pickup with tone and volume controls -  and chicken head knobs to add to the kookiness!!! It also has a piezo rod pickup under the bridge for traditional cigarbox guitar tones! 

The action is slightly raised and it's great for playing lap-slide style! 

Serial Number: M113

Features:
2nd Hand Monte' Cristo Cigar Box
Recycled Hardwood Neck 
AAA Rosewood Fretboard
Single humbucker pickup with tone and volume
Piezo Rod Pickup under Floating Bolt Bridge
Brass Screen Mesh Soundholes
Brass Corners
Bolt Nut 
Strings: (D'Addario) .038, .028 & .018 - Open G (GDG)
Includes 1 x glass bottle neck slide 

If you have any questions at all or would like more photos, email me via the contact page.

These boxes are beautiful visually and tone wise. The action on this guitar is set low, great for finger picking style playing. These boxes resonate really well acoustically, so if you think you'll be playing on the front porch more than plugged in, then these are the go! 

**I have a small stockpile of these boxes and will be making a bunch of these ones over the next month, so watch this space**

name: 4 String Arturo Cigar Box Bass
description:
This is a 4 string Cigar Box Bass. It sounds amazing, if I do say so myself, a bit like an upright bass. It was a custom order and not for sale but thought I would put it up to show ya'll - Happy to replicate it!

It is in standard tuning (EADG). It features to separate pickups with separate jacks. One is a dual piezo pickup and the other is a rod piezo under the bridge attached to a pre-amp with built in tuner! The strings are extra light bass strings and the neck is a 27 inch scale, so it's not too long! 

Features:
Fuente Chateau Cuban Belicoso Cigar Box
Tassie Oak Neck & Fretboard
Piezo Rod Pickup under Floating Hardwood / Nut Bridge
Piezo dual disk pickup
Bone Nut 
Strings:  .084, .072, .056, .044 (EADG)
Includes 1 x glass bottle neck slide 

Serial Number: M111

name: Bottle Neck Slides
description:
Each Cigar Box Guitar comes with a bottle neck slide cut from whatever was the beverage of choice from the week. They are cut rough, but then buffed smooth so they won't cut your finger!!! You can also purchase them separately for $10 + postage. 

They all fit my little finger...
